column1: Unlocking the Crypto Puzzle: Deciphering Bitcoin's RHODL Ratio for Market Insights
column2: In the ever-evolving world of cryptocurrency, a remarkable analytical tool known as the RHODL Ratio has emerged as a beacon of insight into market dynamics. Developed to shed light on capital rotation during cycle transitions, the RHODL Ratio provides invaluable perspectives for both seasoned investors and newcomers to the crypto sphere.

column1: Custodia Bank Appoints Lisa Hough to Support Banking and Bitcoin Custody Services for Institutions
column2: Custodia is pleased to announce that Lisa Hough has joined the bank as Vice President of Strategic Relationships, responsible for helping customers in the U.S. Bitcoin and energy industries ¡§meet their banking and bitcoin custody needs.

column1: Bitcoin's Uncertain Pre-Halving Phase: Crypto Analyst Forecasts a $BTC Price Dip to $23,000
column2: Prominent cryptocurrency analyst Benjamin Cowen has recently shared a sobering forecast on Bitcoin's price trajectory, positing a potential dip to the $23,000 mark after the cryptocurrency traded within a specific range over the last few weeks.
